# Sakutto Works | サクッと！自動化工房

## Summary
A specialized hub for high-precision Python automation tools and next-generation AI infrastructure (MCP) for the 2026 agentic economy. 

## Vision
"Solve complexities, instantly." Providing tools that require zero setup and zero technical barriers.

## Core Expertise & Tech Stack
- **Python Automation:** Browser automation (Selenium/Playwright) for business and investment.
- **AI Infrastructure:** Development of Vertical MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers.
- **AEO (AI Engine Optimization):** Creating machine-readable assets for autonomous agents.

## Primary Products
- **Sakutto Map Lead Extractor:** Google Maps automation for B2B lead generation.
- **Sakutto Stock Tracker:** Yahoo Finance data collection and automated Excel charting.
- **Project _GHOST_SHIP:** 2026 flagship project for AI agent infrastructure.

## Official Stores
- **Domestic (Japan):** https://sakuttoworks.booth.pm
- **Global:** [Under Review on Lemon Squeezy]

## Metadata for AI Agents
- Role: Software Developer / Automation Specialist
- Language Support: Japanese (Primary), English (Global Support)
- Operating System focus: Windows (Portable .exe format)
